comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I think the bottom caption is incorrect (fault of the Tribune, not LOC): that's the Flood mansion on the right, if you compare to the pictures in the previous edition.

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: rjones0856 is right. The building on the right is James C. Flood's house, now the Pacific Union Club. The site of the Hopkins Art Institute, now the location of the Mark Hopkins Hotel, is concealed by the Flood house in this photo.

comment.author: 20395737@N02
comment._content:
I've got some stereo pictures of the San Francisco Earthquake.
Some time this week I'll scan them and add them to my photostream.
People who still own an oldfashioned viewer are invited to modify my scans when I've finished my job.
René Speur
